website_summaries.verdict: A rare smaller-screen Android handset that's worth its price, Alcatel's 4.7-inch Idol 3 is a solid buy for those seeking a low-cost, sub-5-inch phone.
pros: The Alcatel OneTouch Idol 3 (4.7) has a portable, compact size and delivers solid performance across the board for a budget price
Hardware and software extras add value
cons: Stumbling blocks include its harder-to-use camera app and won't work on every global carrier

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 years till Alcatel pushed adware onto the phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone was so good my wife got one too. Then, as other one-star reviewers note, Alcatel started pushing intrusive adware onto the phone as system apps that can't be deleted. They mess with my browsers (Chrome and Firefox) and with Google Translate. We feel that Alcatel has disrespected us as customers, so will not buy any more Alcatel phones. too bad. It was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Thorstein

customer_reviews.title: Full of malicious bloatware. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this phone for the first year. Then the latest updates pushed malware in the form of system apps File Manager, Cleaner, Booster, Joy Launcher, including adware. Cannot be uninstalled or disabled; force stop lasts only a few minutes then it restarts. Phone cannot be rooted to remove system apps. Have tried numerous apps to remove, disable, block, etc. and none have worked. Avoid Alcatel phones like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Terrible software
customer_reviews.text: I used to love my phone, until Alcatel forced the latest terrible update on me. No I have the adware-infested boost file manager which I cannot remove, downgrade, or disable. Also they forced on a bunch of other bloated apps, game ads, and just terrible tools that are always popping up notifications so they can push more ads on me.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Alcatel's Recent System Download Stopped the Phone from Working with My T-Mobile Service
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this phone. It was an unlocked phone I purchased through Amazon that worked great with my T-Mobile service. Then two days ago, I downloaded a required "system update" from Alcatel. Once the update was completed, the phone would no longer read the SIM card. I took it to T-Mobile and they installed a new SIM card and the phone would still not read it. The result is that it is no longer a functional phone. I emailed Alcatel about the issue, but have heard absolutely nothing back from them. I hold Alcatel responsible and will not purchase another product from them. I now have to purchase a brand new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: lots of bugs... the sound is amazing tho, but i dropped the phone about 2 feet today and the top of the screen cracked and then it wouldn't swipe my finger anymore so i went back to my Blu which still works with a cracked screen.
customer_reviews.author: Toua Xiong

customer_reviews.title: This device only got better after receiving the Android-M Update!
customer_reviews.text: Phone was purchased for my son. He's loving the phone so far and has been using it for a couple of months now. Takes pretty good pictures. Phone is snappy even only having 1.5gb of ram. Doesn't crash when he uses Snapchat which he's very happy about!!! His prior phone would crash on some apps. I'd highly recommend this phone for anybody on a budget & wanting a decent mid-range phone. Also, for anybody wondering this device did receive the Android M (Marshmallow) update.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: False advertising, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my boyfriend, who's 5inch phone recently broke. This phone was advertised at over 5", but when we recieved the box says 4.7". Disappointed in the small size of the phone. My boyfriend also says the phone runs terribly slow and he is already looking at getting a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Harman

customer_reviews.title: NOT a happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in May 2017 & worked great. Was very pleased...at 1st! Was able to browse, play games n movies, call/text with no issues. Had phone a total of 4 months & started overheating at 3rd. Took case off but didn't help. Issue now progressed u to point where phone won't charge, crashes constant due to daily heat issues. Disabled & wasted limited $$.Plan to contact Alcatel. Will post follow up after. Currently VERY UNHAPPY with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Battery Dead after 5 1/2 months but resolved with Alcatel Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Hello bought this phone in Sept 2015 now April 2nd the phone is dead, battery probably . So pretty upset I've had phone for 5 1/2 months. Its covered under the 1 year warranty. I will be calling Alcatel Modnay not happy about being without a phone for 3 weeks as i hear on the net. I lliked this phone on every category, voice calls, text, camera good, fast etc but ignored that you can't replace the battery. I'll let you know what happens with manufacturer. Called Alcatel customer service on battery all good 1-855-368-0829
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: The worst thing about this cellphone is the screen
customer_reviews.text: Android goes a little awkward, sometimes it crashes and most of the time overheats out of nothing. The worst thing about this cellphone is the screen, it broke after 2 weeks of use. I was playing Cytus (music game in which you have to press bubbles to score) and suddenly I just couldn't play anymore. I looked at the screen and it was broken from corner to corner. I don't really know if I hit the screen too hard (which I don't think so) or the material is way too bad. I was pretty excited about this smartphone since it reminded me of my now old Moto G. I don't recommend buying this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alcatels gets first prize again with this multiple Alcatel smart phone owner
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, fast, great for foreign travel as I inserted a China Mobil sim and it works perfectly! This phone beats the apple Iphone hands down and also still works with my Alcatel Smart Watch as well perfectly. I have nothing but delight using this phone and I am totally in love with it! I can not imagine anything better with a smart phone. Everything it does is simple, quick, and very fast. The memory is enough for any project I may ever need. RC
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C. Cauchon

customer_reviews.title: Battery never held a charge
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived with built in battery that did not hold charge for more than 5 minutes. Had to return next day ..
customer_reviews.author: P. Chaploutskiy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good phone but it could do
customer_reviews.text: Calling was immensely difficult. It's weird because the phone would shut down. I would keep pressing the on button. It's an inconvenience but if you're on a tight budget, this phone isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Claire (bookscoffeeandrepeat)

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone to replace my wife's phone which is several years old and needed replacing. The phone came boxed with the charger, cord, headphones and instructions. There were English instructions that were well written and easy to follow. It took us about 30 minutes to set up the phone for here and move everything thing over. It has working flawlessly since we got it and she is very pleased with it. It is not going to compete with some of very high end phones but it does have a quad core processor and plenty of speed for what she does. For the price, this is one of the nicest phones that I have seen
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Most impractical phone I ever had. Camera lens off on one side, so easy to cover with fingers. Size and shape awkward. Final straw was call volume, hard to hear most people even with volume cranked. I returned phone.
customer_reviews.author: lizard

customer_reviews.title: Dropped Calls, Low Microphone Volume, a Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great phone, except it keeps loosing network connectivity randomly (especially during phone calls) and I often have to speak very loudly in order to have the person on the other end of the call hear what I'm saying. All in all, a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: ZR

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this seller
customer_reviews.text: This was NOT the product listed, it was obviously used, and it would not work with Cricket. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Not recommending
customer_reviews.text: If you drop it anywhere, if the screen is cracked even if it's NOT on the screen itself, it stops working with the touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Bonser

customer_reviews.title: Great handset - almost as good as a flagship phone
customer_reviews.text: After a series of more flagship handsets (Samsung Galaxy series), I was afraid a lower-end device like the Idol 3 might be a let-down. But I wanted something in this smaller form-factor. And I am not disappointed. It seems very well built, smooth operation, seems great. Can't believe it was as cheap as it was! It's missing some features of the flagships - fingerprint sensor, for example - and doesn't have quite the same CPU specs, so maybe some high-end games might suffer. But for "normal" daily use, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lin

customer_reviews.title: Needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a new phone and I got her the OneTouch Idol 3 issue is can't find an armoured case for it
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Fernander

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid Android smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid Android smartphone. I wear my phone on my belt and wanted to keep the smaller footprint. The display is really good, the speakers are great. I am very satisfied and it doesn't add $25 to $30 to my phone bill like buying phones on AT&T's new plan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: External SD Card not Recognized
customer_reviews.text: at first 4 days, phone feels solid but will not recognized new external 16GB extermal micro SD card. i tried reboot, formating card, and re-installing SD Card but nothing. when i go to settings, storage..it says mount SD card, when i click ....nothing. frustrating as this is why i dumped my old LG optimus F6.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for this price range!
customer_reviews.text: Great entry phone and it would be a good phone for average users too. Smooth performance for everyday tasks. Both cameras are fair, take shots quite fast. Sound quality is above average, nice and loud, and it comes with JBL in-ear earphones, which are quite good too. Also features an update to Android Marshmallow, available as soon as you turn on the phone. Battery isn't great but it lasts for the day. Overall quality is really good, it's as good as I expected for the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One year warranty, not two.
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a month until I let the battery run out, and then it never turned on again. $150 down the drain. I let the phone sit in my drawer for a year. When I went to return it, based on the "Two year warranty," I was told the warranty was only for one year. Read the fine print. There is no two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very nice. I bought it for the stereo speakers built-in and they don't disappoint. The speakers are loud. The screen is clear and can show good videos. The size is just right in my hand. The inverting screen is a great feature to use.
customer_reviews.author: oloap

customer_reviews.title: Best hardware for your value at this price range
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite smartphone of all time. Cheap as dirt, value to hardware second to none, powers through a camera app, three audio apps (soundcloud, bandcamp and spotify), medicore but definitely playable Pokemon Go ability, light google drive use, and it keeps chugging. They definitely had to sacrifice a bit on structural durability to save on cost so please put this in a case as it won't withstand too many hard falls.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The 5.5 Idol 3 is better
customer_reviews.text: This mini Idol 3 doesn't work as well as the 5.5 full-size model. In particular the cellular date is not as responsive. The smaller size is nice but I wish all would work as well as the full-size Idol 3.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: The call quality is terrible, something between fade and tin can. Camera is ok, but image quality well below my previous phones, a Moto G and an LG. Most frustrating of all, after a month, the first time I dropped the phone the screen shattered and that was with an outer casing accessory. The only redeeming quality was the compact size.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondDave

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. It's slim and the 4.7 size is perfect....not too large like the 5.5s. It fits right in your pocket. Good vibration for someone like me that has the phone on silent most of the time. The only drawback is the keyboard. You have to be very precise when using it. It doesn't give you any leeway like most phones. The price compared to paying 3-5x higher through a carrier can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: ml13

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! Great camera, great storage, great screen, great speakers. The only thing is, it has trouble getting service. A lot of dead zones with this phone, my boyfriend has the same service provider and usually has a signal while I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best smartphone for less than $200!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great budget Android phone! Perfect size and weight at 4.7" and 3.88 oz. Takes an SD card for expandable storage. Great speakers for a small phone! Excellent display. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Super Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smartphone for smart people
customer_reviews.text: Awesome no frills unlocked phone. Works great on T-Mobile and gets all the bands so coverage is excellent compared to my old unlocked ATT phone.
customer_reviews.author: Vince L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this phone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this phone for my son for Christmas and he loves it. We are with T-Mobile. He switched his SIM card from his old phone to this phone and hasn't had any problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Draya

customer_reviews.title: The pro is it's a good solid case that protects my phone
customer_reviews.text: The pro is it's a good solid case that protects my phone. The con is with the case on, it's hard to turn on and off, you have to really mash the button on the case (which is a pain).
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Panknin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone! Price-wise and result of handset are quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone! Price-wise and result of handset are quite good. Overall good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great phone/Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT phone for a very affordable price! I am on AT&T goPhone plan and activation was a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn St John

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever had !!
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I ever had !! Love everything about it !
customer_reviews.author: Marion Weimer

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was skeptical at first with an off-name brand I'd never heard of. But this phone rocks! Fast. No glitches. Great speakers. Expandable memory. Only drawbacks are it's not as bright as my old Samsung or camera quite as sharp, but they're more than good enough. I'd buy it again. Nuf said.
customer_reviews.author: John Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive android phone.  It is also pretty light and a decent size (in an era of phablets, this size is still OK).
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive android phone. It is also pretty light and a decent size (in an era of phablets, this size is still OK).
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Idol 3 is the best phone I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Idol 3 is the best phone I ever owned, And I've owned plenty of high priced cell phones in the past, unlocked is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: paulie pontrelli

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone. It is a simple phone but it work good. Maybe the camera not perfect but for the price it is a worthy phone.I am from the caribbean and the phone work ok. It is indeed unlocked.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and much more dependable than other phones in its price range. Great pics and easy to use. The only con is battery life. If you use location services and bluetooth then you must charge everyday. Other than that I love the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick t McSweeney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a year. Solid performer, wonderful design, good run on a charge (about 2 days in my case). Have yet to find something I need from the phone that can't provide.
customer_reviews.author: tjkolev

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid phone at a very low price for all it offers. Stable and fast, definetly worth the shot.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Loula

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: The phone looks nice and works smoothly. Definitely worth the price. The cameras, both front and back, take crisp clear pictures. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Poor hardware
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor hardware which explains the low price. Its been 4 months and I already have a problem with the charging port. It's a struggle to get the phone to charge.
customer_reviews.author: RAJ SRIDHARAN

customer_reviews.title: Better value than you'd think!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone for the price. Good features, sounds, Lollipop works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Royster

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I notice that there are white spots on my screen now appearing. Anyone else have this issue?
customer_reviews.author: P. Li

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have had it for a few months now have not had one problem. Speakers are really great
customer_reviews.author: L. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: This phone is so bad bad and bad
customer_reviews.text: This phone is so bad bad and bad. Image quality is so poor. Hard to connect to wifi with. I would like to change it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely recommend for purchasing this product
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely recommend for purchasing this product..got mine brand new and I'm extremely happy thanks again.. Delivery was fast too got it within 4 days of purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this phone for 3.5 months. It stopped working. I would like some customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Zitting

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, received in perfect condition and the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, received in perfect condition and the phone is very good, very sophisticated and very responsive. Its main feature is that the sound is very good and meets the expectation of a person who is not so demanding, and the owner of the publication are very responsible recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo j rivas v

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery.
customer_reviews.text: The battery on this phone does not hold a charge after only 5 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: J Art Vázquez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not a good phone, feels cheap and after installing the ALCATEL update it breaks bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are so clear. Don't find reversible feature useful. Needed 16gb ROM and this fit the criteria.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: this is a piece of crap purchased it in May can't return it and now ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a piece of crap purchased it in May can't return it and now is won't work now I have a $150.00 paperweight
customer_reviews.author: Carla Tatum

customer_reviews.title: totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: The phone is awesome for the price so worth it. It's perfect hand size but the 5.5" screen would be nicer, but for the extra $70- 80 or w.e. the difference is. It was out of my personal budget
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked!
customer_reviews.text: Review could have been better unfortunatley the product received is not as described. The phone is NOT unlocked! Not cool considering this was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: love

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Good Battery Life.. speaker sound too artificial but for the price it was a great buy. Nice screen for a phone at the time
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money and the sound quality is
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money and the sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Isaac H.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: On point and fair at $149. I love this little phone!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. No issues. Works great. Fast as I need it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Cook

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't what was advertised, the box and product description say that it's an idol one touch 3 but instead I just got the one touch for this price I could have bought something else. As soon as I complained about it they wanted me to return the items since I bought 2 of the same. That is not an option as they were gifts. I would like a refund of the money difference between both items and 30 dollars to cover the screen protector and case that didn't fit this much smaller phone.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Better that my Galaxy...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Galaxy S5 with the idol 3 4.7 and could not be happier! Snappy fast, clear display,basically stock android so none of that Samsung bloat ware you can't remove. The size fits in your pocket and easy to operate with one hand. Battery last me all day with solid use. Love this phone, it was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: tomicamp79

customer_reviews.title: The voice recorder for phone conversation is broken with Android 6.0.1
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this phone but: 1. it won't record phone calls with Android 6.01, I heard this is a deliberated HW setting from the manufacture. This is a shame. 2. The screen auto dim doesn't work. Seriously, such basic feature!
customer_reviews.author: ZM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good model, love Alcatel One Touch !!! very good supplier also!! I received it quickly!! GREAT !!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Riccitelli

customer_reviews.title: good inexpensive phone
customer_reviews.text: Great specs on an inexpensive phone. Works well. Not waterproof as my wife found out with her first one....but good enough to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: Fair enough
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice piece of tech. Only thing I'm looking to change is the way it fades from on song to another, the overlap can ruin the end of a song. I bet there's a way to stop it and I just have to keep playing with the phone to find how.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works great and takes excellent photos
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Works great and takes excellent photos.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Moore

customer_reviews.title: This phone BITES and the company is HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS PHONE! It just died after five weeks and now ALCATEL will not return our calls to their customer service. We cannot get the information we need about the phone for the warranty because ALCATEL asks for numbers off the back that DO NOT EXIST on this model so I cannot send the phone in for service. It is great to get a one year warranty when the company IGNORES YOU so that they do not have to honor the warranty. They might as well offer a life-time warranty. This phone BITES and the company is HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: bwricks

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallow OS is great, the sound is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: A decent mid range phone..Does everything I need it to do..Taste varies per person..Marshmallow OS is great, the sound is AWESOME!.A little slow in some areas, but not a BIG deal breaker..For the price DEFINITELY worth looking into ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the money. Only had it 2 days but loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sevenleafclover

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: The phone came in its original box with a security seal, not only did it come with a good charger(the one that you can plug into a computer or wall) but it also came with JBL headphones. Also, product came in 2 days. I cant believe I got all this with such good quality for such a good price. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ray f.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, awesome speakers on a little phone, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: laura puentes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great for anyone looking for an inexpensive, yet high performing, smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Updated - My experience has definitely gotten better
customer_reviews.text: [EDIT] I've completely altered my original review, as my unit no longer has many of the problems I originally encountered, and a call-drop problem was actually being caused by the way the phone was handling the Skype app. I still have the light-bleed issue, which is the only reason I'm dropping a star. Otherwise, it's been a pretty good phone. One other potential issue is that the phone doesn't really integrate very well with expandable memory, but this is hardly an Android issue exclusive to the OneTouch.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great phone at a very reasonable price point for the specs that are on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i just bought 2, 4. 7 inch versions ...
customer_reviews.text: i just bought 2, 4.7 inch versions one for me and one for my wife, for some reason with both phones when i take a video there is no sound on playback. i even tried uploading it to my google photos app but still no sound on any video taken!!! PLEASE how can i fix this? already tried rebooting, factory reset, erasing cache and raising all volumes on sounds and messaging.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Never again will I trust all the positive reviews of an Alcatel phone - lasted two days before problems started. Battery draining within 2 hours of unplugging the phone without even using the phone or installing any apps. Just had email set for push notifications and wifi and gps on like I have used all my other phones. the next problem was the phone switching between earpiece and speaker phone multiple times during a phone call. Returned phone and will try the new moto g.
customer_reviews.author: Pats fan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rubber inner-sleeve does not look good on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: The Prince

customer_reviews.title: Okay phone ruined by manufacturer bloatware
customer_reviews.text: Upon purchase the phone was okay, probably worth about 3 stars as a cheap but reliable budget phone. The camera's not great but at this price point can't expect much more. What brings the phone rating down to a single star is the Alcatel has elected months later to push out large amounts of bloatware under the guise of updates. What these "updates" actually do is install not only unremovable applications, but applications that cannot even be disabled. The names of these software parasites are "Joy Launcher" and "File Manager". Even if one installs an alternative Launcher (Nova, etc,) the unwanted software from Alcatel still keeps rearing it's very ugly and invasive head.
customer_reviews.author: rfgenerator

customer_reviews.title: It used to be really good. I liked the features like the great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for two years. It used to be really good. I liked the features like the great speakers, reversibility feature, simple to use. However, lately, the system updates have brought on a ton of malware and adware that just frustrates me. Apps like joylauncher, boost,adding malware or adware to the file manager. Just wondering why Alcatel would do this to their phone and reputation. I am currently looking for a new phone and it certainly will not be an alcatel.
customer_reviews.author: nuwestm

customer_reviews.title: great mid-range phone
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super light Great stereo speakers had the latest android picks up all t-Mobile bands Stylish design - sleek and beautiful Cons: Camera is bad. Not good for high res photos like the more expensive phones. There is a dead pixel/white spot in my screen. I didn't want to get the phone replaced just because of that, so I live with that everyday. Not very noticeable though Some apps take a while to load, but work fine once loaded. Hey..you get only so much RAM for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: wolfboi

customer_reviews.title: Average phone
customer_reviews.text: Average phone; decent features all around and nice thin form factor. The battery is non-removable. That knocks an entire star off. Android Lollipop is... deficient. That knocks the second star off. Lollipop has numerous issues. Hotspot doesn't always work with all clients and mDNS is flaky, weird media player/background behavior, etc. All known issues, all classified as "won't-fix". This is endemic of all Lollipop devices. Otherwise the performance and specs of the phone are actually pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Broke shortly after
customer_reviews.text: Couple months after purchase the phone fell. Had a tiny crack at the corner and the screen, however refused to work, screen / phone became unresponsive. Replaced the screen but stopped working again. Seemed like a good enough phone, the sound quality was great, nice camera. However, was not meant to be. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: lindy

customer_reviews.title: No regrets here.
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking for a Samsung phone, but I wanted the latest version of Android in a phone that would fit in my pocket. The Idol 3 was just what I needed. Pictures are great for a phone, the OS runs smoothly, battery life is good - gets me through the day easily on a full charge, and it's a great size. The only irritating thing is answering the "what kind of phone is that?" question then watching the confused looks because they've never heard of Alcatel. I'm certainly glad to have skipped the "big names".
customer_reviews.author: momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a simple person who just wanted a simple phone. This accomplished that and then some. I refuse to pay a car/rental/mortgage payment for a cell phone (in other words I am not paying $1,000 for a cell phone!!!) This was a great price for a great phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: JB Adams

customer_reviews.title: Avoid unless you like bloatware
customer_reviews.text: Was a decent phone for a while until they started installing bloatware at will with no option to uninstall. I'll never buy an Alcatel phone again.
customer_reviews.author: Mako

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and weight of this phone. A friend has a Samsung Galaxy S6 and we both think it's too bulky. Personal preference... It's nice to have a micro SD to load up with photos and music. Music player is fun to mess with. If I could change one thing it would be dual SIM. Works great with US-Mobile. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for 1.5 years now. Still very happy with it. Small size, good performance in many countries on many systems. Good call quality, good data service, supports more LTE bands than others of its generation. Since the screen isn't Gorilla Glass, you definitely need a screen protector. You're not going to get the latest Android version on it, but if that doesn't matter, it's a good phone for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: It was fine at first it has a really nice design and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about 7 months before I dropped it on its screen for the first time and it cracked. Usually with a cracked screen a phone is still functional.... that is not the case for the Idol 3. It was fine at first it has a really nice design and great display. The camera could be better, but I cant complain about that considering the price tag. The only thing other than the cracked screen problem was that the phone was oddly buggy? Certain apps I would use like Snapchat or Miitomo would just.... Stop Responding whenever I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone. Light on apps
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Light on apps, upgraded to newest Android, and is fast with apps, tethering, and everything in between. One of the best unlocked phones out there. Also, audio quality and included JBL earbuds sound great, and the camera and flexibility of this phone is amazing. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The mother of all product reviews

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for language options!
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but the seller misled in its add. Yes , it unlocked , international but it only had 5 language. I mean it as a gift for someone who doesn't know English, French, Spanish or German. I needed Russian but it was not there!!! So make sure you are getting a phone with a language options for setting commands /tools that you'd actually know
customer_reviews.author: Zoya Golban

customer_reviews.title: The "Samsung" beater you should be getting!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my dad in India, replaced his Micromax phone. Dad is super delighted. Superb performance, very good photography, long battery life, super slim. Android is not overly skinned but practical and lightweight. BTW, the next generation of this phone (Idol 4) is the Blackberry Android phone. Strong cred there!
customer_reviews.author: Gaj Aiyer

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good.
customer_reviews.text: It started out as a good phone. A system update butched it. It has more bloatware now that is impossible to disable. The speed and battery life have deteriorated rapidly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lithgow

customer_reviews.title: Poor build, fast processing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this device, but after opening it I noticed a bright spot near the bottom of the display. After a few days this spot grew into two and got much brighter. Tapping the screen, made that area flash almost as if it were under a lot of pressure. Performance of the phone was good, but in the end I returned it before the display issue really panned out. Does not matter how inexpensive a product is, it should arrive in 100% working condition.
customer_reviews.author: SupKarma

customer_reviews.title: It slipped off my lap while I was sitting in ...
customer_reviews.text: It slipped off my lap while I was sitting in a chair, falling 1.5 feet to the ground and the screen exploded. Yeah it's my fault because I "dropped" it. But how many phones have I had in my life that i've dropped from much higher distances, and that has never happened. :(
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: You could do better
customer_reviews.text: This phone is marred by unacceptable Bluetooth performance. It literally drops my Bluetooth headset when I put it in my pants pocket! On the plus side, the sound and speaker phone functionality is quite good, as other reviewers have mentioned. It also is not an exceptionally rugged phone as the screen broke after a fall from less than 3 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C Kovar

customer_reviews.title: My first smart phone and am very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My first smart phone and am very satisfied. I did not want a large phone and this was the perfect size. Also could not justify paying more than a couple hundred for a "phone". Love it. Has just enough features that I would use. Bought one for my sister also and we both agree it has enough of what we need.
customer_reviews.author: areuthere

product_meta.title: ALCATEL OneTouch Idol 3 Global GSM Unlocked 4G LTE Smartphone, 4.7 HD IPS Display, 16GB - Gray
product_meta.description:
Style:Phone OnlyALCATEL OneTouch Idol 3 Global Unlocked 4G LTE Smartphone, 4.7 HD IPS Display, 16GB (GSM - US Warranty)

AMAZON.COM
Android M now available via software update on all Alcatel Idol Unlocked phones.
feature_bullets: Featuring Award-Winning JBL Audio by Harman IDOL™ 3 brings an amazing on-the-go music experience! With dual front-facing JBL stereo speakers IDOL™ 3 packs professional audio quality to the palm of your hand for true-to-life sound.

IDOL™ 3 has been specially tuned for leading color and image innovation through Technicolor™ Color Enhance technology giving the IDOL™ 3 a vivid cinematic color experience right in the palm of your hand.
Pocket Perfect Form Factor: The IDOL™ 3 (4.7) is designed to be slim and compact for a first class user experience .Android 5.0 Lollipop

Powered by an Quad-Core Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 410 processor the IDOL™ 3 delivers ultra-fast 4G LTE connectivity to help keep up with your fast paced life. Get lost in stunning HD video and console-quality gaming.

Break free of carrier contracts with the award-winning IDOL™ 3. Recognized for delivering a high-quality crisp viewing experience slim elegant design and unique features like a fully reversible user-interface the IDOL ™ 3 has all the features.
Model 6039S-2AALUS7; compatible with Micro SIM Cards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars342 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
